# ion-select-option

SelectOption is a component that is a child element of Select. For more information, see the [Select docs](../select).


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                 | Type      |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If `true`, the user cannot interact with the select option. | `boolean` |
| `selected` | `selected` | If `true`, the element is selected.                         | `boolean` |
| `value`    | --         | The text value of the option.                               | `any`     |
